Models¶

Ad model¶

class app.models.ad.Ad(**kwargs)¶

Model representing an advertisement.

Field Name

Description

Type

id

The unique identifier for the advertisement

int

title

The title of the advertisement

str

description

The description of the advertisement

str

date

The date of the meeting

Date

time

The time of the meeting

Time

location

The location of the meeting

str

classroom

The classroom of the meeting

str (max length: 5)

max_members

The maximum number of members allowed for the meeting

int

actual_members

The actual number of members currently joined in the advertisement

int

rate

The rate of the advertisement

float

subject

The subject of the advertisement

str

ad_type

The type of the advertisement

str

student_email

The email of the student who published the advertisement

str
class app.models.ad.Enrollment(**kwargs)¶

Model representing an enrollment relation between a user and an advertisement.

Field Name

Description

Type

ad_id

The unique identifier of the advertisement the user is enrolling in.

int (Foreign Key referencing Ad)

student_email

The email of the student enrolling in the advertisement.

str (Foreign Key referencing User)

This model serves as the intermediate table in a many-to-many relationship between the Ad model and the User model. Each record in this table represents an enrollment, where a user (student) is linked to an advertisement. The ad_id and student_email fields serve as a composite primary key ensuring that the same user cannot enroll multiple times in the same advertisement.

class app.models.ad.GenericNotification(**kwargs)¶

Model representing a generic notification for events such as ad deletion.

Field Name

Description

Type

id

The unique identifier for the notification

int

student_email

The email of the user receiving the notification

str (Foreign Key referencing User)

message

A custom message explaining the reason for the notification

str

is_read

A boolean variable indicating whether the notification is read or not

boolean

date_created

The date and time when the notification was created

DateTime

notification_type

The type of notification (e.g., ‘ad-delete’)

str
class app.models.ad.Notification(**kwargs)¶

Model representing a notification related to an advertisement.

Field Name

Description

Type

id

The unique identifier for the notification

int

ad_id

The ID of the advertisement related to the notification

int (Foreign Key referencing Ad)

author_email

The email of the user who created the ad

str (Foreign Key referencing User)

notification_type

The type of notification (e.g., ‘unsubscribe’, ‘auto-enroll’)

str

student_email

The email of the student involved in the notification action

str (Foreign Key referencing User)

date_created

The date and time when the notification was created

DateTime

message

A custom message which explains the reason why user see the notification

str

is_read

A boolean variable that determines whether the notification is new or has already been read

boolean
class app.models.ad.WaitingList(**kwargs)¶

Model representing a waiting list relation between a user and an advertisement.

Field Name

Description

Type

ad_id

The unique identifier of the advertisement the user is on the waiting list for.

int (Foreign Key referencing Ad)

student_email

The email of the student on the waiting list for the advertisement.

str (Foreign Key referencing User)

position

The position of the student in the waiting list for the advertisement.

int

This model serves as the intermediate table in a many-to-many relationship between the Ad model and the User model for managing waiting lists. Each record in this table represents a user’s position on the waiting list for a specific advertisement. The ad_id and student_email fields serve as a composite primary key ensuring that the same user cannot be on the waiting list multiple times for the same advertisement.
